actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance during 1976 of $2 bills bearing the likeness of Mount Rushmore National Memorial.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to issue, during 1976, $2 bills bearing the likeness of Mount Rushmore National Memorial.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance during 1976 of $2 bills bearing the likeness of Mount Rushmore National Memorial.
